title: Bloomberg Markets: Lafferty Sees `Synchronized Growth Track'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lafferty Sees `Synchronized Growth Track'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Lafferty\u0010Chief Market Strategist\u0010Natixis Global Asset Management \u0010Discussing how as long as the global economy grinds higher, news of the day will not impact the markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
